properties.areaDesc: Burns Harbor to Michigan City IN; Calumet Harbor IL to Gary IN; Gary to Burns Harbor IN
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 9:35PM CST until January 4 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
* WINDS...Northwest to 25 kt Saturday, West gales to 35 kt with
a few gusts to 40 kt Sunday.

* SIGNIFICANT WAVES...to 6 ft Saturday and Sunday.

* OCCASIONAL WAVES...to 8 ft Saturday and Sunday.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
are expected to produce hazardous wave conditions to small craft.
Inexperienced mariners...especially those operating smaller
vessels should avoid navigating in these conditions.

A Gale Watch is issued when the risk of gale force winds of 34 to
47 knots has significantly increased...but the specific timing
and/or location is still uncertain. It is intended to provide
additional lead time for mariners who may wish to consider
altering their plans.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM CST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING
